title: Последние 24 часа
overview: NTV has an action-packed show called "The Last 24 Hours," which will solve the most mysterious crimes in modern Russia. When the investigation has reached a dead end and the crime has gone unpunished, desperate people have only one chance to find out the truth. The best psychics will reconstruct the last day of the victim's life minute by minute and find out what exactly happened on that fateful day. Thus, by reconstructing the events of moments in the life of the deceased, step by step, the experts will get closer to the solution.
